source_note: State baseline derived from Wyoming DEQ and local program guidance; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: No statewide organics requirement; composting of yard/food waste permitted under local/site rules.
organics.bin: Green/yard waste cart or drop-off where offered.
organics.notes: Programs are locality-specific; check city/county services.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or community drop-off.
paper_cardboard.notes: Greasy or wax-coated paper is not accepted.

glass_containers.guidance: Bottles and jars only; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Separate glass bin or drop-off if available.
glass_containers.notes: Many towns do glass by drop-off only.

metal_containers.guidance: Empty, rinsed aluminum and steel/tin cans.
metal_containers.notes: Exclude scrap metal and pressurized containers.

plastics.guidance: Recycle rigid containers accepted locally (commonly #1â€“#2; others vary).
plastics.notes: No plastic bags, film, or foam curbside.

household_batteries.guidance: Treat as universal waste; recycle rechargeables and lead-acid.
household_batteries.notes: Do not place in trash or curbside recycling.

e_waste.guidance: Use local e-waste events or certified recyclers; some landfills run take-back programs.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at designated e-waste collection sites.
e_waste.notes: Accepted device lists vary by site.

plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to retail/store drop-offs if available.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Keep film out of blue bins to prevent jams.

bulky_items.guidance: Arrange special pickup or take to transfer station/landfill.
bulky_items.bin: Do not place in standard carts.
bulky_items.notes: Fees/limits depend on locality and hauler.
provenance: Local solid-waste program rules in WY
